title: Subchapter C - Truck Mileage and Fuel Use Taxes
content:
Subchapter C - Truck Mileage and Fuel Use Taxes

State Regulations

Article 1 - Highway Use and Fuel Use Permits (Part 470 to 475)

Article 2 - Truck Mileage Tax (Part 480 to 489)

Article 3 - Fuel Use Tax (Part 490 to 505)

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. Article 1 - Highway Use and Fuel Use Permits (Part 470 to 475)

Article 2 - Truck Mileage Tax (Part 480 to 489)

Article 3 - Fuel Use Tax (Part 490 to 505)
